job_tasks.phrase: Be a true consultant and efficiently translate customer business needs into end-to-end technical solutions and effectively communicate them to business stakeholders
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly indicates the need to understand business needs and translate them into technical solutions for stakeholders.

job_tasks.phrase: building scalable data pipelines and cloud infrastructure
job_tasks.justification: Explicitly mentions building data pipelines and cloud infrastructure, which are core components of data engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: Conceptualize, design and implement data and cloud architecture
job_tasks.justification: This phrase covers the entire lifecycle of data and cloud architecture, from conceptualization to implementation.

job_tasks.phrase: Build and deploy batch and streaming data pipelines
job_tasks.justification: Directly refers to the creation and deployment of data pipelines, a key data engineering task.

job_tasks.phrase: Build and deploy production ready applications on Cloud
job_tasks.justification: Indicates the development and deployment of applications in a production environment, which falls under software development.

job_tasks.phrase: building scalable data pipelines and cloud infrastructure
job_tasks.justification: While also data engineering, the 'scalable' and 'cloud infrastructure' aspects touch upon operational readiness and deployment.

job_tasks.phrase: Build and deploy production ready applications on Cloud
job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'production ready' implies deployment and operational aspects of applications.

soft_skills.phrase: effectively communicate them to business stakeholders
Collaborate with ML and Software Engineers, Project Managers, and clients
efficiently translate customer business needs into end-to-end technical solutions
building scalable data pipelines and cloud infrastructure using a dynamic and cutting-edge tech stack

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes data pipelines, cloud infrastructure, and the implementation of end-to-end technical solutions. While LLMs are mentioned in the introductory paragraph, the core responsibilities and listed technologies (Dataflow, DBT, BigQuery, Terraform) are strongly indicative of a data engineering and MLOps focus, aligning more closely with the ML Engineer profile.
